txt.en:
'I cannot help Wynmar now, but I wish to send help to his people. Please go to Stangard and do all that you can for them, my friend.

'The Elves will hold this border for them and ensure that they receive gifts from the forest when they find themselves hungry or ill-equipped.

'As for me, I will remain here and contemplate this unlooked-for loss. Perhaps in the future, I would not act as I did to someone like Wynmar on principle only and instead listen to my heart before precious time is wasted....'
'What have we here? A [placeholder] calling at our gates during these strange times?'
'I will remain here and think for a while on what has passed. My heart is heavy.'
You have helped in Thinglad as much as was needed, and now it is time to offer your aid to the folk of Stangard.
Call at the northern gate of Stangard
Stangard is the city to the south of Thinglad, in Eorlsmead.\n\nYou should attempt to gain entry to the city of Stangard.
